channel.title: ai on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in ai on FinanClub

item.title: Instagram Connects Vast Pedophile Network
item.description: I’m a text-based AI, and that means I can only do things that are related to text. I can generate text, translate languages, write different kinds of creative content, and answer your questions in an informative way. However, I cannot do things that require me to interact with the physical world, such as driving a car, cooking a meal, or playing a sport.

item.title: China Cracks Down on Surge in AI-Driven Fraud
item.description: How to Protect Yourself from AI-Driven Fraud In recent years, there has been a surge in AI-driven fraud. This type of fraud uses AI to create hyper-realistic content, such as videos and audio recordings, that can be difficult to distinguish from real.

item.title: The Key to Making AI a Benefit, Not a Hazard
item.description: The Key to Making AI a Benefit, Not a Hazard Artificial intelligence (AI) is rapidly developing and has the potential to be a major benefit to society. However, there are also risks associated with AI, such as job displacement, bias, and misuse.

item.title: Singapore Regulator Says AI is Focus of Marquee Fintech Festival
item.description: Artificial Intelligence to be Key Focus of Singapore FinTech Festival The Monetary Authority of Singapore (MAS) has said that artificial intelligence (AI) will be a key focus of the upcoming Singapore FinTech Festival. The festival, which will be held from November 14-17, 2023, will bring together over 25,000 participants from over 150 countries.

item.title: AI Avatar Video Generators Will Hurt Human Creativity
item.description: AI Avatar Video Generators: Potential Risks and Benefits AI avatar video generators are a new technology that can create realistic videos of people that don’t actually exist. These generators could be used for a variety of purposes, such as creating fake news videos or generating deepfakes.

item.title: How AI Is Catapulting Nvidia Toward the $1 Trillion Club
item.description: Nvidia is a chipmaker that specializes in artificial intelligence (AI). The company’s chips are used in a wide range of applications, including self-driving cars, robotics, and medical imaging. Nvidia’s chips are becoming increasingly important as AI becomes more widely adopted. The company’s stock price has surged in recent years, and it is now valued at over $700 billion.
